```{python}
#| label: setup

import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from matplotlib.patches import Rectangle


df = pd.read_csv('data/raw/raw.csv')

# 2. Set the "Blue/White" Minimalist Design System
sns.set_theme(style="whitegrid", context="talk")
# Palette: 0 (Loser) = Soft Grey, 1 (Winner) = Professional Blue
custom_palette = {0: '#bdc3c7', 1: '#005b96'} 

plt.rcParams['figure.figsize'] = (10, 6)
plt.rcParams['font.family'] = 'sans-serif'

```

## Media Scores vs. User Scores
```{python}
#| label: fig-disconnect
#| fig-cap: "Not only scores."

if not df.empty:
    plt.figure(figsize=(11, 6))
    
    # Scatter Plot: Metascore vs User Score
    sns.scatterplot(
        data=df, 
        x='Metascore', 
        y='Userscore', 
        hue='Winner', 
        style='Winner', 
        palette=custom_palette, 
        s=250, 
        alpha=0.9,
        legend=False
    )
    
    # Reference Line: Perfect Agreement (Scaled: 100 Meta = 10 User)
    plt.plot([60, 100], [6, 10], '--', color='grey', alpha=0.5)
    plt.text(62, 7.5, 'Perfect Agreement Line\n(Scaled: 100 Meta = 10 User)', color='grey', fontsize=10)

    for i, row in df.iterrows():
        if row['Userscore'] < 7 and row['Winner'] == 1:
            plt.text(
                x=row['Metascore'], 
                y=row['Userscore'] - 0.4, 
                s=row['Name'],            
                fontsize=9, 
                color='black', 
                weight='bold',
                ha='center'              
            )
    # Annotation for "The Gap"

    plt.title('Critic Score vs. Player Score', fontsize=16, fontweight='bold', pad=20)
    plt.xlabel('Critic Metascore (Media)')
    plt.ylabel('User Score (Players)')
    
    sns.despine(left=True)
    plt.show()

```


## The Strategic Drivers

```{python}
#| label: fig-drivers
#| fig-cap: "Creativity = Reputation"

if not df.empty:
    metrics = ['Artistry_Score', 'Gameplay_Score']
    targets = ['Winner', 'Userscore']
    
    corr_matrix = df[metrics + targets].corr()
    
    dumbbell_data = pd.DataFrame({
        'Awards (Winner)': [
            corr_matrix.loc['Artistry_Score', 'Winner'],
            corr_matrix.loc['Gameplay_Score', 'Winner']
        ],
        'Player Love (UserScore)': [
            corr_matrix.loc['Artistry_Score', 'Userscore'],
            corr_matrix.loc['Gameplay_Score', 'Userscore']
        ]
    }, index=['Artistry', 'Gameplay'])

    fig, ax = plt.subplots(figsize=(10, 6))

    color_awards = '#005b96'  
    color_players = '#2ecc71' 

    # y=index (0, 1...), xmin=Awards, xmax=Players
    ax.hlines(
        y=range(len(dumbbell_data)), 
        xmin=dumbbell_data['Awards (Winner)'], 
        xmax=dumbbell_data['Player Love (UserScore)'], 
        color='lightgrey', 
        alpha=0.6, 
        linewidth=6,
        zorder=1
    )

    ax.scatter(
        dumbbell_data['Awards (Winner)'], 
        range(len(dumbbell_data)), 
        color=color_awards, 
        s=900, 
        label='Awards Impact (Winner)',
        zorder=2
    )
    ax.scatter(
        dumbbell_data['Player Love (UserScore)'], 
        range(len(dumbbell_data)), 
        color=color_players, 
        s=900, 
        label='Player Impact (UserScore)',
        zorder=2
    )

    for i in range(len(dumbbell_data)):
        val_award = dumbbell_data.iloc[i]['Awards (Winner)']
        val_player = dumbbell_data.iloc[i]['Player Love (UserScore)']
        
        ax.text(val_award, i, f"{val_award:.2f}", 
                color='white', ha='center', va='center', fontweight='bold', fontsize=14, zorder=3)
        
        ax.text(val_player, i, f"{val_player:.2f}", 
                color='white', ha='center', va='center', fontweight='bold', fontsize=14, zorder=3)

    ax.set_yticks(range(len(dumbbell_data)))
    ax.set_yticklabels(dumbbell_data.index, fontweight='bold', fontsize=14)
    
    ax.set_xlim(min(dumbbell_data.min()) - 0.05, max(dumbbell_data.max()) + 0.05)
    ax.set_xlabel('Correlation Coefficient (Impact Factor)', fontsize=12, labelpad=15)
    
    ax.set_title('What Matters to Awards vs. Players?', 
                 fontsize=18, fontweight='bold', pad=20, loc='left')

    ax.legend(loc='upper right', frameon=True, framealpha=0.9)

    sns.despine(left=True, bottom=False)
    
    ax.xaxis.grid(True, linestyle='--', alpha=0.5, zorder=0)
    ax.yaxis.grid(False) 

    plt.tight_layout()
    plt.show()
```
